alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula; Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 21 at 5:01PM EDT until May 21 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN TRUMBULL AND SOUTHWESTERN ASHTABULA COUNTIES... At 501 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Orwell, or 14 miles east of Chardon, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Orwell, Hartsgrove, Roaming Shores and Rock Creek. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
